alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Dallas; Hickory; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 8:34PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN HICKORY... SOUTHWESTERN DALLAS...SOUTHEASTERN CEDAR AND POLK COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM CDT... At 834 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Humansville, or 7 miles east of Stockton, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Stockton State Park, Stockton Lake, Pomme de Terre Lake, Buffalo, Stockton, Humansville, Polk, Pleasant Hope, Fair Play, Morrisville, Halfway, Flemington, Aldrich, Bearcreek, Masters, Brighton, March, Eudora and Foose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
